Code Interface¶

class epyk.interfaces.components.CompCodes.Code(context)¶
code(language, text='', color=None, width=90, '%', height=200, 'px', htmlCode=None, options=None, helper=None, profile=None)¶

Generic code editor

Underlying HTML Objects:

  • epyk.core.html.HtmlTextEditor.Code

https://codemirror.net/index.html

Parameters

  • language – String. The language

  • text – String. The text

  • color – String. The color code

  • width – Tuple. The with details in the format(value, unit)

  • height – Tuple. The height details in the format(value, unit)

  • htmlCode – String. The unique component ID

  • options – Dictionary. The object properties

  • helper – String. Optional. The helper message

  • profile – Dictionary. Profiling details
